Source code for rlang.language.RLangErrorStrategy

from antlr4.error.ErrorStrategy import DefaultErrorStrategy
from antlr4.Parser import Parser
from antlr4.error.Errors import InputMismatchException, NoViableAltException, ParseCancellationException, RecognitionException



[docs]class RLangErrorStrategy(DefaultErrorStrategy):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
    

[docs]    def recoverInline(self, recognizer: Parser):
        self.reportError(recognizer, InputMismatchException(recognizer))

        # raise InputMismatchException(recognizer)


[docs]    def sync(self, recognizer: Parser):
        # pass
        try:
            super().sync(recognizer)
        except:
            pass
